page.title: 12LUDFORD _ INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Many small businesses operate in village. At western end, partly in war time RAF Nissen Huts (Once the Camp Cinema), a small industrial estate is developing, _ number employed in brackets. Garden Centre & Viking Way Cafe, started 1982, sells plants, garden buildings and equipment and specialises in Birds ranging from all kinds of foreign Finches up to large Parrots (2). A Car Body Shop for spray _ing and repairing Car Bodies (2). An Antiques Centre (1). A Pine Stripping business which strips and refurbishes old pine furniture (2). Two more Car Repair Workshops (1) & (1). A Car Breaker _ after Parish Council inter_ _vention now screened by trees (2). A Wood Yard producing Logs, Stakes &c and doing Forestry work (2). Concrete Products _ concrete wall blocks and Paving Slabs (2).
